掉.definition: to fall; to drop; to lag behind; to lose; to go missing; to reduce; fall (in prices); to lose (value, weight etc); to wag; to swing; to turn; to change; to exchange; to swap; to show off; to shed (hair); (used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

掉以輕心.definition: to treat sth lightly; to lower one's guard

掉價.definition: drop in price; devalued; to have one's status lowered

掉價兒.definition: erhua variant of 掉價|掉价[diao4 jia4]

掉向.definition: to turn; to adjust one's direction; to lose one's bearings

掉換.definition: to swap; to replace; to exchange; to change

掉書袋.definition: lit. to wave around one's bookbag (idiom); fig. to show off one's erudition; a person who does so

掉漆.definition: to peel off (paint); (fig.) to be exposed; to lose face (Tw)

掉色.definition: to lose color; to fade; also pr. [diao4 shai3]

掉過兒.definition: erhua variant of 掉過|掉过[diao4 guo4]

掉鏈子.definition: to have one's bicycle chain come off; (fig.) to let sb down; to drop the ball; to screw up

掉隊.definition: to fall behind; to drop out

掉頭.definition: to turn one's head; to turn round; to turn about

掉頭就走.definition: to turn on one's heels; to walk away abruptly
